## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Is your feature request related to a problem?
Example: "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like. Be as detailed as possible.

## Example Usage

Show how this feature would be used:

```bash
prozes <command> <args> --new-option
```

Or describe the expected output/behavior.

## Alternative Solutions

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Cases

Describe specific scenarios where this feature would be useful:

1. Use case 1: ...
2. Use case 2: ...

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.

### Related Features

- Does this relate to any existing features?
- Are there similar features in other tools? (e.g., cookiecutter, vue-cli)

### Priority

How important is this feature to you?

- [ ] Critical - I can't use Prozes without this
- [ ] High - This would significantly improve my workflow
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Just a suggestion

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues and discussions to avoid duplicates
- [ ] I have provided a clear description of the feature
- [ ] I have explained the use cases and benefits
- [ ] I am willing to contribute to this feature (if applicable)
